descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]This is my very first mod so it is probably horrible but anyway..........
<br />[i]You are[/i] [i]approached by a Strange Man at the Sleeping giant once he walks up to you he will say [quote]The world is in fate's hands will you help us or are you against us.[/quote]The Dragonborn will be very confused. Before he/she has time to react he will be sent to a cave on the edge  of a country called Terrian, which is like skyrim in the middle of a war, a girl and boy named Jane Tuthra Spiritwolf and Nickoles Creed ( or Wolf and Hawk) the dragonborn will then go on a quest with them
<br /> 
<br />I am not saying anymore you'll have to find out the rest on your own MAHAhAHAHAH..........
<br />[/i][/size][/font]
author: Spiritwolf11
